articles.content: Alongside the global launch of its Mi 11 Android flagship, Xiaomi announced an aggressively priced 4K TV dubbed Mi TV Q1 75. Its a 75-inch QLED panel with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR+ and 192-zone full… [+834 chars]

articles.title: Infinix Smart 5 India Launch Date Set for February 11, to Feature Dual Rear Cameras and 6.82-Inch Display - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Infinix Smart 5 will launch in India on February 11 at 12pm (noon), the company has shared via a press release. A dedicated Flipkart page has also been made live on the e-commerce platform.
